description:
Family forms

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
12211 Microcensus

Definition:
In the microcensus, families are classified to the following
family forms/types in line with the concept of living
arrangements: "married couples (with children)", "cohabiting
couples (with children)" and "lone parents (with children)".


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Family forms
